official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to conduct a feasibility study on providing flood protection in the Monongahela River Basin, West Virginia and Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to conduct a feasibility study on different methods of providing flood protection in the Monongahela River Basin, West Virginia and Pennsylvania. Requires a report to the Congress within two years of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to conduct a feasibility study on providing flood protection in the Monongahela River Basin, West Virginia and Pennsylvania.
